description: This file defines a React component 'UsersTable' for managing user data in an admin interface. It includes functionalities for listing, searching, creating, and deleting users, interacting with external API functions and rendering a UI table with modal dialogs.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles creation of a new user, calls API, refreshes user list, and resets form state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a user by ID, calls API, and refreshes user list.
